reuters.title: ABITIBI-PRICE INC 3RD QTR SHR 45 CTS VS 42 CTS
reuters.body: New Jersey investor David F. Bolger said he has delivered requests for a special meeting of Cleveland-Cliffs Inc <CLF> shareholders representing more than 25 pct of the total voting shares in the company. Bolger, who heads a group that owns 6.4 pct of Cleveland-Cliff's outstanding stock, said he is seeking the special meeting to remove the current board of directors and elect his nominees. The Bolger group had called for a special shareholder meeting prior to the company's recent issuance of four mln new shares, Bolger said. Reuter 
